meanings.definition: To have sung to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: She besung a lullaby to her baby every night.
meanings.sent2: The birds besung a beautiful melody in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The cat besung a meow to ask for more food.
meanings.sent4: The wind besung a haunting tune through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The choir besung a harmonious song that echoed through the church.

meanings.definition: To have been sung about or praised.
meanings.sent1: Legends besung the brave knight's heroic deeds.
meanings.sent2: The famous singer was besung by fans all over the world.
meanings.sent3: The cake was besung with compliments at the party.
meanings.sent4: The ancient ruins were besung in epic poems of old.
meanings.sent5: The hero was besung in tales of valor and courage for generations to come.
